You must provide valid parameter for the toolkit_connection_type in the application res/values/strings.xml file before running the first time.
You must update valid values for Direct_AccountName and Direct_AccountKeythe in the application res/values/strings.xml file before running the first time.

You must update valid values for cloud_ready_acs_namespace, cloud_ready_acs_realm, cloud_ready_acs_proxy_service and cloud_ready_acs_symmetric_key in the application res/values/strings.xml file before running the first time.
You must update valid value for CloudReadySimple_ProxyService in the application res/values/strings.xml file before running the first time.
